trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around May 23rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out on the deck around 11:00 pm. Looking west. I saw a bright white l.ght appear in the sky. I asked my wife if she saw it we watched it for about 30 seconds as it rapidly ascended upward to the west. and disappeared. We couldn't believe what we had just seen. It looked like a shooting star in reverse. As it was going out of the atmosphere rather than into it.
Summary: Star like light appeared out of thin air, accelerated quickly and disappeared.
